text: Special Agent 7 is a 1958 American TV series starring Lloyd Nolan. ==Premise== Special Agent Philip Conroy (Nolan) works for the Internal Revenue Service. ==Cast== *Lloyd Nolan as Philip Conroy ==References== ==External links== * *List of episodes at CTVA Category:1958 American television series debuts Category:1959 American television series endings Category:1950s American crime television series Category:Black-and-white American television shows Category:English-language television shows Category:First-run syndicated television programs in the United States Category:Television series by Universal Television
title: Special Agent 7
